title: What is Domain Overview?
content:
Domain Overview
Try Domain Overview

Domain Overview presents a range of overview metrics about a domain’s online visibility so you can quickly get a full picture of a website’s online presence. You’ll see the domain’s organic and paid search traffic and backlinks. From a Domain Overview, you can click on any of the data modules to jump into more specific reports on Semrush and continue your analysis further.

Here is the list of features this tool provides:

A quick overview of any domain’s overall search engine presence — estimated organic and paid traffic, number of backlinks
Instant analysis of a website’s top keywords — organic positions, recent position changes, keyword intent, advertising keywords, and more
Options for analyzing global and mobile databases
Collect previews of the deeper competitive research reports on Semrush
Ability to research a domain, subdomain, subfolder, or URL
Analyze a Growth Report of a domain's performance over time
Why should you use this report?
Domain Overview Reports and Features
Limits
Export Options

Research a Domain

images.alt: Organic Traffic and Organic Keywords trend graphs for the 6-month time period. A filter for daily and monthly data is highlighted with red.

After entering a website into a search bar, open the dropdown menu via the arrow icon on the right. The list of available options (root domain, exact URL, subdomain, subfolder) will be available for selection.
The 'Export PDF' button is highlighted in the top right corner.
